summary:
In this mod I\'ll added a Jester Clothes recipe, so you can craft them using the tanning rack! 
So now you can look silly(or badass) with minimal effort.
descriptionHtml:
CRAFTABLE JESTER CLOTHING -- Full release
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Description & Content
2. Installation instructions
3. Future features
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Did you always think that wearing those funny Jester Clothes would be cool(without killing anyone)? If so, this mod is for you! It adds the Jester Outfit along with a custom crafting recipe. 

The mod adds the following:  
Jester Clothes
Jester Glooves 
Jester Boots
Jester Hat

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Crafting Recipes~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

                              Jester Clothes= 10 Leather & 8 Leather Strips 
                              Jester Glooves= 5 Leather & 2 Leather Strips 
                              Jester Boots= 7 Leather & 3 Leather Strips 

------------------------------------------------Installation instructions------------------------------------------------------

2. To install, just extract the \"Craftable Jester Clothes.esp\" file to /skyrim/data. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

3. This mods is a WIP(work in progress), so it\'s not finished yet.
I have some things that I would like to add, like this:

Unenchanted version.
I\'ll add a different type, with armor rating if you want.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-
Please, if you have an idea that can make the mod better, leave a comment!

Note: If you like it, please endorse!

Enjoy!
author: JarlBalgruuf
